items.name: Pink Birthday Bento Cake Set
items.description: Elegant bento cake set featuring a heart-shaped 'Happy 31st Birthday' cake with pearl border, accompanied by 4 matching cupcakes with pink and white frosting. Perfect for intimate celebrations and gift giving.

items.name: Humorous 25th Birthday Bento Set
items.description: Fun and playful bento cake set featuring a heart-shaped cake with 'Not me Turning 25' message and crying character, accompanied by 5 cupcakes with hilarious South African slang messages like 'HAMU SERIOUS!', 'Bathong 25 vele?', and 'HAIBO 25 VELE!'. Perfect for those who love humor with their celebrations.

items.name: Elegant Black & Gold Birthday Bento Set
items.description: Sophisticated bento cake set featuring a main cake with black buttercream rosettes, gold pearl decorations, and 'Happy Birthday' script, accompanied by 5 cupcakes including calendar design, personalized name, and elegant birthday messages. Perfect for milestone celebrations and sophisticated tastes.

items.name: Standard Bento Cake & 5 Cupcakes Set
items.description: Classic bento cake set featuring 1 beautifully decorated cake with 5 matching cupcakes. Perfect for small celebrations and intimate gatherings. Price excludes happy birthday cake topper and custom-made cake topper.
items.notes: Base price excludes happy birthday and custom cake toppers. Add toppers separately if needed.

items.name: Pink 21st Birthday Heart Cake
items.description: Beautiful pink heart-shaped cake with elegant ruffled piping and personalized birthday message. Perfect for milestone celebrations with decorative ribbons.

items.name: White Birthday Memorial Heart Cake
items.description: Elegant white heart-shaped cake with cream frosting and decorative black ribbons. Features personalized photo panels and custom birthday message. Perfect for special birthday celebrations and memorial occasions.

items.name: Red Calendar Heart Cake
items.description: Stunning red heart-shaped cake with vibrant red frosting and white pearl decorations. Features a personalized calendar design in the center with custom month and year. Perfect for anniversary celebrations and special date commemorations.

items.name: Gold 60th Birthday Milestone Cake
items.description: Luxurious gold and white milestone cake featuring elegant '60' number topper, 'Happy Birthday Mum' script, and sophisticated gold and white sphere decorations with metallic feather accents. Perfect for celebrating life's precious milestones.

items.name: April Calendar Birthday Milestone Cake
items.description: Elegant white fondant milestone cake featuring a personalized April 1985 calendar design with highlighted special date. Decorated with white sugar roses, gold spherical accents, pink macarons, and a gold 'Happy Birthday' topper. Perfect for celebrating birth month milestones and special anniversaries.

items.name: Pink & Gold Drip Birthday Cake
items.description: Stunning single-tier cake featuring elegant pink and gold drip effect cascading down the sides, topped with beautiful pink and gold roses and 'Happy Birthday' script topper. Decorated with pearl and gold ball accents throughout the drip design for a luxurious milestone celebration.

items.name: White Botanical Birthday Cake
items.description: Sophisticated white cake with artistic botanical design featuring white chocolate or fondant leaf decorations arranged vertically. Includes elegant 'Happy Birthday' script on white chocolate plaque with delicate white flower accent. Perfect for modern, minimalist milestone celebrations.

items.name: Pink & Gold Anna Birthday Cake
items.description: Elegant two-tier milestone cake with pink top tier and gold bottom tier, featuring purple and cream roses with gold fan decoration. Decorated with gold spherical accents and personalized name on the base. Perfect for celebrating special milestones with sophisticated style.

items.name: Automotive Birthday Cake
items.description: Sophisticated black cake with automotive theme featuring realistic car wheel decorations on top and around the base. Decorated with elegant gold 'Happy Birthday' script lettering and personalized name in gold around the base. Perfect for car enthusiasts and automotive lovers celebrating special occasions.

items.name: Elegant Bow Tie Gentleman Cake
items.description: Sophisticated black cake with elegant gold bow tie decoration and luxurious gold and black spherical decorations with star accents on top. Features personalized message on the base with decorative footprint elements. Perfect for formal celebrations and milestone birthdays.

items.name: Best Husband & Dad Milestone Cake
items.description: Elegant two-tier milestone cake with white top tier and black bottom tier, featuring '50' number topper and 'Best HUSBAND & Dad' text in gold. Decorated with sophisticated gold and black spheres and decorative fan-like elements. Perfect for celebrating milestone birthdays and honoring special men in your life.

items.name: Black & Gold Luxury Birthday Cake
items.description: Sophisticated two-tier black cake with stunning gold drip details and dramatic black fan decorations on top. Features gold and black spherical decorations arranged elegantly around both tiers, with personalized name on the base. Perfect for milestone celebrations and luxury birthday events.

items.name: Best Dad & Husband Family Cake
items.description: Heartwarming white cake celebrating fatherhood with 'BEST DAD & HUSBAND' text and beautiful family silhouettes around the sides. Topped with black and silver spherical decorations and 'Happy Birthday' script topper. Perfect for honoring fathers and celebrating family bonds.

items.name: Arsenal Football Team Cake
items.description: Spectacular Arsenal FC themed cake featuring the iconic Arsenal logo, player jerseys (Odegaard #8, Rice #41), realistic soccer balls, and personalized name on the base. Perfect for Arsenal fans and football enthusiasts celebrating birthdays or special occasions.

items.name: Manchester City Football Cake
items.description: Stunning Manchester City themed cake with sky blue decorations, official Manchester City logo, soccer balls, balloon cluster, age number, and personalized name. Ideal for Manchester City supporters and football birthday celebrations.

items.name: Olaf & Elsa 4th Birthday Cake
items.description: Magical Frozen-themed cake featuring beloved Olaf snowman topper with his signature smile and stick arms, plus Elsa portrait on the side. Decorated with blue and white winter theme, snowflakes, spherical decorations, and personalized name around the base. Perfect for young Frozen fans celebrating their special day.

items.name: Elsa 'Let It Go' 9th Birthday Cake
items.description: Spectacular three-tier Frozen cake featuring Elsa portrait on top tier with 'LET IT GO' text and number topper. Beautiful blue ombre ruffled layers transitioning from white to deep blue, decorated with snowflakes and sparkly base. A show-stopping centerpiece for any Frozen celebration.

items.name: Elsa Enzo 4th Birthday Cake
items.description: Enchanting two-tier Frozen cake with light blue frosting featuring Elsa portraits on both tiers, 'Happy Birthday' and number '4' toppers, white snowflake decorations, and blue & purple balloon clusters. Personalized with 'ENZO' on the base and decorated with pearl accents for a winter wonderland effect.

items.name: Elsa's Ice Castle Cake
items.description: A magical three-tier castle cake inspired by Elsa's ice palace, featuring shimmering blue and white fondant with edible snowflakes and crystal decorations

items.name: Spider-Man Cityscape Adventure Cake
items.description: Epic Spider-Man themed cake featuring a dramatic cityscape design with Spider-Man mask on the front, various Spider-Man character toppers including different Spider-Man variants, spider web decorations, and red & black balloon clusters. Perfect for superhero fans with 'ROWAN' personalization on black base.

items.name: Classic Spider-Man Web Cake
items.description: Traditional Spider-Man cake with vibrant red frosting covered in white spider web piping, featuring Spider-Man character images around the sides, number topper, and 'SPIDER-MAN' logo topper. Includes personalized name on base for the ultimate Spider-Man birthday celebration.

items.name: Tall Spider-Man City Tower Cake
items.description: Impressive tall blue Spider-Man cake with the iconic Spider-Man mask prominently displayed on the front, cityscape toppers with Spider-Man figures, custom name and number toppers, and red & blue balloon decorations. Features modern comic book design elements perfect for superhero celebrations.

items.name: Nokuhle 2nd Birthday Cocomelon Cake
items.description: Delightful two-tier green Cocomelon cake featuring JJ character on top with rainbow, watermelon character, number '2', colorful balloons, white clouds and stars decorations. The signature Cocomelon bus is prominently displayed on the bottom tier with 'NOKUHLE' spelled out in colorful letters around the base.

items.name: 1st Birthday Cocomelon Cake
items.description: Charming two-tier Cocomelon cake with blue top tier and green bottom tier, featuring JJ character on top with number '1', white clouds and stars, and the signature Cocomelon bus on the bottom tier. 'BIRTHDAY' is written in colorful letters around the base for a perfect first birthday celebration.

items.name: Akonaho 1st Birthday Animal Friends Cocomelon Cake
items.description: Adorable two-tier pink Cocomelon cake featuring JJ character on top with number '1', and various beloved Cocomelon animal characters including elephant, pig, and duck arranged around a colorful rainbow on the bottom tier. 'AKONAHO' is spelled out in alphabet blocks around the base, perfect for educational fun.

items.name: Mokone Garden Theme Cocomelon Cake
items.description: Beautiful two-tier cream Cocomelon cake with natural garden theme featuring rainbow topper, JJ character, butterfly decorations, daisy flowers, watermelon character, and various colorful balloon clusters. 'MOKONE' is written around the base with a delightful garden-like aesthetic while maintaining the cheerful Cocomelon spirit.

items.name: Safari Lwandile 7th Birthday Cake
items.description: Sophisticated two-tier safari adventure cake with elegant green marble effect frosting, featuring golden safari animals including giraffe, elephant, and lion. Decorated with black tropical leaves, pampas grass, and a stunning balloon garland in gold, green, black and white colors. Perfect for safari-themed celebrations with 'LWANDILE 7' personalization.

items.name: Lion King Oreha 1st Birthday Cake
items.description: Delightful Lion King themed cake featuring beloved characters Simba, Timon and Pumbaa with wooden 'OREHA' sign and number '1' topper. Decorated with tropical leaves and sandy base decoration creating an authentic Pride Lands atmosphere. Perfect for young Lion King fans with colorful and child-friendly design.

items.name: Dinosaur Ugochukwu 3rd Birthday Cake
items.description: Exciting two-tier dinosaur jungle cake with 'Happy 3rd Birthday' banner featuring various colorful dinosaur characters on top including T-Rex, Triceratops, and Pterodactyl. Green and white tiers decorated with tropical foliage and 'UGOCHUKWU' personalization. Perfect for young dinosaur enthusiasts and prehistoric adventure themes.

items.name: Lion King Mvelo Safari Cake
items.description: Spectacular two-tier Lion King themed cake with Simba and Mufasa on top tier, featuring beloved characters like Timon and Pumbaa around the sides. Beautiful sunset colors with orange and blue tiers, elephant silhouettes, and 'MVELO' personalization on the base. Perfect for celebrating with the Circle of Life theme.

items.name: Safari Dithoriso Jungle Animals Cake
items.description: Amazing two-tier safari cake with blue and green colors featuring a wonderful collection of jungle animals including lion, monkey, giraffe, tiger, and zebra. Decorated with wooden 'DITHORISO' sign, tropical leaves, and lush foliage decorations creating an authentic jungle safari experience.

items.name: Safari Mzands 6th Birthday Cake
items.description: Beautiful green jungle-themed cake with '6' number featuring an amazing collection of safari animals including lion, giraffe, monkey, zebra, and elephant. Decorated with 'Mzands' topper, tropical monstera leaves, and wooden tree trunk base design creating a complete jungle adventure experience.

items.name: Ballet Butterfly Elegance Cake
items.description: A sophisticated two-tier princess cake featuring delicate ballet shoes, purple butterflies, and elegant gold script lettering. Perfect for young dancers and princess celebrations with 'THANDO' personalization.

items.name: Masha and Bear Adventure Cake
items.description: A delightful fairy tale cake featuring beloved Masha character with forest elements, apple tree, mushrooms, and charming wooden fence details. Perfect for 'SINE' 3rd birthday celebration.

items.name: Rainbow Butterfly Garden Cake
items.description: A modern princess cake with soft pastels, featuring rainbow arches, delicate butterflies, smiling clouds, and whimsical garden elements. Perfect for 'OKUHLE' 4th birthday celebration.

items.name: Elegant Butterfly Cascade Cake
items.description: A sophisticated three-tier princess cake with white and pink ombre effect, featuring cascading pink butterflies, pearl details, and golden birthday message. Perfect for 'DZUVHA' 10th birthday celebration.

items.name: Barbie Princess Dream Cake
items.description: A glamorous Barbie-themed princess cake with pink frosting, rainbow decorations, stars, and official Barbie princess imagery. Perfect for 'AZANIA' 5th birthday celebration.

items.name: Royal Crown Princess Cake
items.description: A majestic three-tier princess cake featuring a golden crown topper, quilted white middle tier with pink hearts, and luxurious pink ruffled base. Perfect for 'OWETHU' 10th birthday celebration.

items.name: Magical Unicorn Castle Cake
items.description: An enchanting three-tier unicorn cake with rainbow mane unicorn topper, colorful flowers throughout, mushroom decorations, and magical garden elements. Perfect for 'CELOKUHLE' 5th birthday celebration.

items.name: Transformers Bumblebee Action Cake
items.description: Epic Transformers Bumblebee cake featuring a 3D Bumblebee figure on top with yellow and black colors, Autobot logo on the side, yellow and black star decorations, and personalized name on the base. Perfect for Transformers fans celebrating their special day with authentic robot action.

items.name: Superman Action Hero Cake
items.description: Dynamic Superman cake with blue frosting and red drip effect, featuring multiple Superman character toppers, 'SUPERMAN' banner, yellow star decorations, and iconic Superman logo on the front. Perfect for superhero fans with personalized name on the base.

items.name: Batman 5th Birthday Cake
items.description: Impressive Batman cake with white frosting and black drip, featuring Batman mask and logo, 'POW' and 'HAPPY BIRTHDAY' toppers, number topper, personal photo element, and personalized name on the base. Perfect for young Batman fans with comic book style elements.

items.name: Dragon Ball Z Goku Power Cake
items.description: Spectacular Dragon Ball Z cake with blue frosting featuring Goku character image with flame decorations on top, orange Dragon Balls around the base, and personalized name. Perfect for anime and superhero fans celebrating with authentic Dragon Ball Z elements.

items.name: SpongeBob SquarePants 1st Birthday Cake
items.description: Fun SpongeBob SquarePants cake with yellow frosting featuring SpongeBob's iconic face with big eyes and smile, stick arms extending from the sides, various SpongeBob characters on top with number '1', and 'THAPELO' personalized on the base. Perfect for young SpongeBob fans.

items.name: Minecraft Adventure Birthday Cake
items.description: Epic two-tier Minecraft cake with green grass top tier and brown dirt bottom tier, featuring Minecraft characters on top including Steve, Creeper, and others, TNT blocks, 'LESEGO' name topper, and authentic Minecraft logo. Perfect for gaming enthusiasts and Minecraft fans.

items.name: Numberblocks 5 Educational Birthday Cake
items.description: Educational Numberblocks cake with blue frosting featuring colorful number characters on top including number '5' with rainbow, white clouds, and 'AMO' written on the side. Perfect for young learners celebrating with their favorite educational characters.

items.name: Paw Patrol Angela 3rd Birthday Cake
items.description: Adorable two-tier Paw Patrol cake with pink top tier and blue bottom tier, featuring Paw Patrol characters on top including Chase, Marshall, Skye, and Rubble, number '3', blue and red balloon clusters, and 'ANGELA' personalized on the base. Perfect for Paw Patrol fans.

items.name: Mickey Mouse 1st Birthday Cake
items.description: Classic Mickey Mouse cake with blue frosting featuring Mickey's iconic face and white gloved hands, number '1' with star decorations, silver and teal star toppers, and letter cookies around the base. Perfect for Disney fans and first birthday celebrations.

items.name: Classic White Roses with Monogram
items.description: Elegant three-tier white wedding cake featuring handcrafted sugar roses cascading from top to side, with personalized gold script monogram on middle tier. Perfect for traditional and romantic weddings.

items.name: Navy & White Botanical Magnolia
items.description: Stunning four-tier wedding cake with alternating white and navy tiers, featuring textured chevron pattern and cascading white magnolia flowers with orange berries and natural greenery.

items.name: Gold Mandala Luxury Wedding Cake
items.description: Sophisticated three-tier cake with gold metallic top tier, pristine white middle tier, and ornate mandala pattern bottom tier. Features elegant white sugar flowers and luxurious gold detailing.

items.name: Portuguese Tile with Blue Bow
items.description: Cultural two-tier wedding cake featuring authentic Portuguese tile patterns on bottom tier with elegant white top tier. Crowned with a stunning blue patterned fabric bow and white flower accent.

items.name: Mediterranean Tile Pattern Masterpiece
items.description: Bold three-tier wedding cake completely adorned with intricate blue and gold Mediterranean tile patterns separated by elegant gold grid lines. Features decorative patterned fabric accent on top.

items.name: African Protea Cultural Wedding Cake
items.description: Vibrant two-tier cake celebrating African heritage with traditional beadwork patterns on middle tier and geometric tribal designs on bottom tier. Crowned with a magnificent protea flower.

items.name: White Roses Monogram with Texture
items.description: Refined three-tier white wedding cake featuring 'R+A' monogram, cascading white roses, and elegant textured bottom tier with vertical line pattern. Classic romance meets modern sophistication.

items.name: Modern Fabric Drape Sculptural Cake
items.description: Contemporary three-tier white wedding cake featuring dramatic flowing fabric-like fondant draping with elegant gold trim edges. A true work of edible art for modern couples.

items.name: Timothy Teddy Bear Balloon Cake
items.description: Adorable single-tier white cake featuring a handcrafted brown teddy bear sitting on a toy car base. Decorated with blue and beige balloon cake pops on wooden sticks creating a whimsical balloon bouquet effect. Perfect for baby boy showers with personalized name plaque.
flavors: Red velvet with cream cheese frosting

items.name: Kylian Turns One Teddy Bears Cake
items.description: Sophisticated two-tier cake with white top tier and blue striped bottom tier. Features elegant gold script lettering and adorable brown teddy bears with blue bow ties positioned around the cake. Decorated with beautiful blue, white, and grey balloon arrangements.
flavors: Red velvet with cream cheese frosting

items.name: Baby Boy Hot Air Balloon Cake
items.description: Stunning single-tier cake with artistic blue and white watercolor brushstroke effect and gold accents. Features elegant gold script 'Baby Boy' lettering, blue and white hot air balloon toppers, and an elaborate balloon garland in blue, white, gold, and grey tones.
flavors: Red velvet with cream cheese frosting

items.name: Ginger Snap Cookies
items.description: Classic ginger snap cookies with warm spices and a perfectly crispy texture. These traditional cookies feature a beautiful crackled surface and rich ginger flavor that melts in your mouth.

items.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
items.description: Soft-baked chocolate chip cookies loaded with premium dark chocolate chips. These golden-brown cookies offer the perfect balance of chewy texture and rich chocolate flavor in every bite.

items.name: Sugar Cookies
items.description: Classic buttery sugar cookies with a tender, melt-in-your-mouth texture and delicate vanilla flavor. These golden cookies have slightly crinkled edges and a perfectly sweet taste.

items.name: Assorted Melting Moments Tray
items.description: Beautiful selection of buttery melting moment biscuits with decorative piped patterns in star and swirl designs. Each biscuit features the classic melt-in-your-mouth texture with colorful cherry and sprinkle decorations. Perfect for special occasions and gift giving.

items.name: Melting Moments Tub
items.description: Generous tub filled with traditional melting moment biscuits featuring the classic buttery shortbread texture with decorative piped ridges. Each biscuit melts delicately in your mouth and some are topped with colorful cherry decorations for extra sweetness.

items.name: Traditional Buttermilk Scones
items.description: Classic homemade buttermilk scones with golden-brown crusts and tender, flaky interiors. Baked fresh daily with the perfect balance of buttery richness and light texture. Ideal for breakfast, afternoon tea, or any time you crave a traditional bakery treat.

items.name: Pink Coconut Snowballs
items.description: Delightful round cake treats rolled in pink-tinted coconut flakes, creating a festive and colorful snowball effect. Soft, moist cake interior with sweet coconut coating that melts in your mouth.

items.name: Chocolate Coconut Snowballs
items.description: Rich chocolate cake balls rolled in a mixture of chocolate crumbs and white coconut flakes, creating the perfect 'snow-covered' appearance. A classic treat with deep chocolate flavor.

items.name: Chocolate Roman Creams
items.description: Classic chocolate Roman cream biscuits with rich cocoa flavor and smooth vanilla cream filling. These traditional oval-shaped sandwich biscuits offer the perfect balance of chocolate and cream in every bite.

items.name: Vanilla Roman Creams
items.description: Traditional vanilla Roman cream biscuits with golden buttery cookies and rich vanilla cream filling. A timeless classic that melts in your mouth with every bite.

items.name: Red Velvet Roman Creams
items.description: Luxurious red velvet Roman cream biscuits with vibrant red cocoa cookies and smooth cream cheese filling. A modern twist on the classic Roman cream with rich red velvet flavor.
flavors: Red Velvet with White Chocolate Cream

items.name: Classic Fudge Brownies
items.description: Rich, dense chocolate brownies with a glossy fudgy texture and deep chocolate flavor. Cut into perfect squares and served in a convenient clear container. These indulgent brownies are made with premium cocoa for the ultimate chocolate experience.

items.name: Zebra Stripe Brownies
items.description: Elegant chocolate brownies decorated with distinctive white chocolate drizzle in a beautiful zebra stripe pattern. These gourmet brownies combine rich chocolate base with artistic white chocolate decoration for a sophisticated presentation.
flavors: Milk Chocolate with White Chocolate Stripes
Red Velvet with Cream Cheese Drizzle

items.name: Assorted Glazed Donuts
items.description: Delicious variety pack of 6 glazed donuts featuring different flavored glazes and toppings. Includes pink glazed with white drizzle, chocolate glazed with white drizzle, golden glazed with colorful sprinkles, and white glazed with rainbow sprinkles. Perfect for sharing or trying multiple flavors.
flavors: Fruity Mix (Pink Strawberry, Lemon, White Vanilla)

items.name: Red Velvet Crumb Cupcakes
items.description: Decadent cupcakes topped with smooth vanilla buttercream frosting and sprinkled with red velvet cake crumbs. Each cupcake features elegant swirl piping and the perfect balance of sweet cream and rich red velvet flavor.
flavors: Red Velvet with Cream Cheese Frosting

items.name: Chocolate Buttercream Cupcakes
items.description: Rich chocolate cupcakes topped with luxurious chocolate buttercream frosting piped in perfect rose swirls. Made with premium cocoa for an intense chocolate experience that melts in your mouth.
flavors: Milk Chocolate with Peanut Butter Frosting

items.name: Caramel Swirl Cupcakes
items.description: Moist vanilla cupcakes topped with rich caramel buttercream frosting piped in elegant swirls. Each cupcake features decorative element and offers the perfect balance of vanilla cake and buttery caramel flavor.

items.name: Layered Trifle Cup
items.description: Delightful individual trifle featuring layers of vanilla custard, fresh berry compote, fluffy whipped cream, and cake pieces. Topped with a cherry and served in a convenient clear cup with dome lid.

items.name: Berry Cheesecake Cup
items.description: Creamy individual cheesecake with graham cracker crust, smooth cheesecake filling, and a vibrant berry compote layer. Topped with berry sauce and served in a clear container.

items.name: Tiramisu Cup
items.description: Classic Italian tiramisu in individual serving size. Features coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with rich mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder and finished with chocolate drizzle.

items.name: Cherry Cheesecake Cup
items.description: Individual New York style cheesecake with graham cracker crust, rich cream cheese filling, and topped with cherry compote and a fresh cherry. Perfect portion-controlled dessert.

items.name: Chocolate Drizzle Swiss Roll
items.description: Decadent chocolate Swiss roll filled with light vanilla cream and topped with an elegant chocolate drizzle pattern. A perfect balance of rich chocolate cake and smooth cream filling.

items.name: Chocolate Shavings Swiss Roll
items.description: Rich chocolate Swiss roll with creamy white filling, generously topped with chocolate shavings and decorative chocolate pieces. A chocolate lover's dream dessert.
flavors: Dark Chocolate with White Chocolate Cream

items.name: Red Velvet Swiss Roll
items.description: Classic red velvet Swiss roll with smooth cream cheese filling, topped with red velvet crumbs for an authentic red velvet experience in every bite.
flavors: Traditional Red Velvet with Cream Cheese

items.name: Pink Coconut Swiss Roll
items.description: Light vanilla Swiss roll filled with strawberry cream and covered in pink-tinted coconut flakes. A delightfully sweet and tropical treat with beautiful presentation.

items.name: Carrot Cake Swiss Roll
items.description: Moist spiced carrot cake rolled with rich cream cheese frosting and topped with decorative piped cream cheese and a fondant carrot. All the flavors of classic carrot cake in Swiss roll form.

items.name: White Round Cake Boards - Multi Pack
items.description: Professional white round cake boards in a convenient multi-pack. Food-safe and sturdy construction perfect for supporting cakes of all sizes. Essential for cake presentation and transport.

items.name: Silver Decorative Round Cake Boards
items.description: Premium silver round cake boards with elegant decorative pattern on top. Features a sophisticated embossed design that adds luxury to your cake presentation. Bulk pack for professional use.

items.name: Premium White Round Cake Boards
items.description: High-quality white round cake boards with clean, professional finish. Perfect for wedding cakes, birthday cakes, and special occasions. Smooth surface ideal for elegant presentations.

items.name: Gold Round Cake Boards
items.description: Luxurious gold round cake boards that add elegance and sophistication to any cake presentation. Perfect for special occasions, weddings, and milestone celebrations.

items.name: Black Slate Round Cake Boards
items.description: Sophisticated black round cake boards with natural slate-like finish. Creates dramatic contrast and modern elegance for contemporary cake designs and upscale presentations.

items.name: 6 Cupcake Box
items.description: Sturdy white square box with 6 circular cutouts designed to hold standard cupcakes securely during transport.

items.name: Tall Cupcake Display Box
items.description: Premium tall square display box with clear window, featuring multiple tiers of circular cutouts for elegant cupcake presentation.

items.name: 8 Cupcake Box
items.description: Professional white square box with 8 circular cutouts arranged in 2 rows, ideal for medium-sized cupcake orders.

items.name: Mini Treats Box
items.description: Large square box with multiple small circular cutouts, perfect for mini cupcakes, cake pops, or small treats display.

items.name: Windowed Cake Boxes
items.description: Elegant white square cake boxes with clear top windows, available in various sizes for different cake types and occasions.

items.name: Basic Square Cake Box
items.description: Simple, sturdy white square cake box without window, perfect for secure cake transport and storage.

items.name: Happy Birthday Gold Script Topper
items.description: Elegant gold script 'Happy Birthday' cake topper with flowing cursive lettering. Perfect for adding a luxurious touch to any birthday celebration.

items.name: Gold Rhinestone Crown Topper
items.description: Stunning gold crown cake topper adorned with sparkling rhinestones and crystals. Ideal for princess parties, milestone birthdays, and royal-themed celebrations.

items.name: Soccer Ball Cake Decorations
items.description: Set of 9 realistic soccer ball cake decorations made from high-quality edible materials. Perfect for sports-themed cakes and football fan celebrations.

items.name: Rainbow Cake Decoration Set
items.description: Colorful rainbow cake decoration kit with vibrant rainbow arch and matching colorful ball decorations. Brings joy and color to any celebration.

items.name: Gold Crystal Crown Topper
items.description: Magnificent gold crown cake topper with intricate crystal detailing and ornate design. Perfect for creating show-stopping celebration cakes fit for royalty.

items.name: Yellow Happy Birthday Circle Topper
items.description: Bright yellow 'Happy Birthday' cake topper with circular design and elegant script lettering. Adds a cheerful pop of color to birthday celebrations.

items.name: Assorted Colored Cake Balls
items.description: Collection of colorful edible cake decoration balls in various sizes and vibrant colors including pink, blue, yellow, green, and more. Perfect for adding texture and color to any cake design.

items.name: Gold Birthday Toppers Collection
items.description: Premium set of gold 'Happy Birthday' cake toppers in various elegant script styles. Includes multiple designs for versatile decoration options.

items.name: Premium Baby Pink Fondant
items.description: High-quality baby pink cake covering fondant that's silky smooth with great taste and easy to use. Perfect for creating elegant pink-themed cakes and decorations with professional results.

items.name: Gold Botanical Leaf Topper
items.description: Exquisite gold botanical cake topper featuring intricate leaf design with delicate line work. This elegant decorative piece adds sophisticated natural beauty to wedding cakes and special occasion desserts.
